aboutinformation-card1: We are a professional engineering company specializing in the construction of large-scale solar photovoltaic power plants. We offer comprehensive turnkey solutions for the design, construction, and commissioning of solar photovoltaic projects based on the principles of sustainable development, energy efficiency, and environmentally friendly technologies.
aboutinformation-card2: 1. Direct involvement in projects with a total installed capacity exceeding 500 MW 2. Successfully completed tracker system installation at the 250 MW Nur Bukhara Solar Power Plant located in Olot District, Bukhara region 3. Eective collaboration with leading international and regional companies, including U Energy (South Korea), Baihai Solar, and Power Sun 4. Skilled in-house team for PV module installation, tracker assembly, electrical connections, geodetic surveying, and HSE compliance 5. Proven experience in modernizing schools, industrial, and social infrastructurefacilities using solar energy co-friendly materials, and construction techniques that minimize environmental impact.
andijan-warehouse: Andijan – more than 0.5 MW of PV panels

univer: Andijan Machine-Building Institute (MEM), Faculty of Renewable Energy Sources
certificares-info: We proudly hold locally and internationally recognized certifications and licenses that validate our commitment to excellence, safety, and sustainability.
project-page-title1-desc: Within the framework of the project agreed between 'New Eco Energy' LLC and 'PRIME TOWN' LLC, the construction of a 300 kW solar photovoltaic power plant at the Nurafshon City Court building, located in Tashkent Region, Nurafshon City, is about to commence.

about-goal-desc: To protect nature, promote unity, use natural resources responsibly, and leave a clean and safe environment for future generations.
value4: Keeping our word / Delivering on our promises
about-variation-1: Comprehensive engineering documentation for solar power plants and electrical infrastructure in compliance with international standards.
about-variation-2: Safe and stable integration into national and local power grids, including protection and stability systems.
about-variation-3-title: Grid Protection and Stability Using RAS, WAMS / WACS Technologies

Integration of solar and wind energy sources.

Turnkey EPC projects.
Complete EPC cycle for PV power plants — from design to commissioning.

Ensuring:
continuous operation of power plants,
improved efficiency,
reduction of production losses.
Technical consulting.

project-page-title7-desc: The Sherabad Solar Project (457 MW), located in Sherabad District, Surkhandarya Region, is one of the largest solar photovoltaic power plants in Uzbekistan, implemented by Masdar — a leading renewable energy company from the United Arab Emirates. New Eco Energy actively participated in the construction of this project, demonstrating its expertise in electrical installation and technical works.
project-page-title7-desc-reduced: One of the largest solar photovoltaic power plants in Uzbekistan, located in Sherabad District, Surkhandarya Region, and implemented by Masdar (UAE).
project-page-title8-desc: The Nur Bukhara 250 MW Solar Photovoltaic Power Plant and Battery Energy Storage System (BESS), implemented in Olot District, Bukhara Region, is a large-scale infrastructure project comprising a 250 MW solar PV plant and an integrated battery energy storage system. The project was successfully executed under the order of Masdar (UAE). New Eco Energy actively participated in the project, fully and professionally carrying out construction and installation works in compliance with international standards, quality control, and HSE requirements.
project-page-title8-desc-reduced: A large-scale infrastructure project in Olot District, Bukhara Region, comprising a 250 MW solar PV plant and a battery energy storage system (BESS).
project-page-title9-desc: The Sarimay Solar Plant, with a capacity of 126 MW and located in the Khorezm Region, was successfully commissioned by Voltalia, an international renewable energy company, and contributes to the region’s stable power supply. New Eco Energy actively participated in the project by performing electrical installation works, making a significant contribution through its qualified specialists and practical experience. All works were completed in full compliance with international standards and safety requirements.
